definitions: a tree or shrub that has wood from which a snakebite antidote or other medicinal extract is obtained.

notes.text: Several species, in particular the tree Strychnos minor or 'colubrina' (family Loganiaceae), of the Indian subcontinent

shortDefinitions: tree or shrub which has timber from which snakebite antidote

definitions: a tropical American tree which has timber with a snakeskin pattern, used for decorative work.
shortDefinitions: tropical American tree which has timber with snakeskin pattern
